description.message: Støt verdens mest effektive velgørende organisationer gennem dine daglige køb online uden ekstra omkostninger.

notificationActivate.message: Start raising money for charities with this website by clicking here:

notificationActivated.message: You are now collecting money for charities with this website.

topbarActivateInfo.message: Begynd at støtte velgørende organisationer med dette website ved at klikke her:

topbarActivatedInfo.message: Du støtter nu velgørende organisationer med dette website.

topbarActivatedClose.message: Dette vindue lukker automatisk om 5 sekunder

optionsTopbarTitle.message: Fortæl mig, når jeg har mulighed for at støtte velgørenhedsorganisationer med mit køb

optionsTopbarDescription.message: Når du besøger en af vores partneres website, vil du kunne se en bjælke øverst på siden, der giver dig mulighed for at støtte velgørenhedsorganisationer ved blot at klikke på en knap. Hvis du klikker på knappen, vil du blive bedt om at bekræfte, at du vil støtte Altruisto gennem dine køb på det website, du besøger. Derefter doneres der normalt mellem 1-6 % af dit køb til de velgørende organisationer, vi støtter.

optionsSuggestionsTitle.message: Vis mig forslag, mens jeg surfer på internettet

optionsSuggestionsDescription.message: Denne indstilling giver dig mulighed for at se en lille kasse med kampagner, kuponer og produkter, der muligvis interesserer dig, baseret på indholdet af den side, du er på. Den vises med mellemrum i nederste højre hjørne af din browser. Når du beslutter dig for at købe et foreslået produkt, modtager en af verdens mest effektive velgørende organisationer en del af overskuddet fra salget (prisen, du betaler, ændres ikke). Vi forsøger at gøre det så hurtigt og uforstyrrende som muligt.

optionsSearchDescription.message: Når du bruger en søgemaskine som for eksempel Google, Bing eller DuckDuckGo, vil  links til en af vores partners websites være fremhævede, så du straks kan se, gennem hvilke websites, du kan støtte velgørende formål.

youSpent.message: you spent with our partner you help:

donationIsActive.message: The donation for $domain$ is active! When you buy something charities will get donations!

errorEmailIsNotValid.message: Provided email address is not valid

successfullyRegisteredAndLoggedIn.message: You have been successfully registered and logged in. Thank you!

sentLinkToResetPassword.message: We've sent you an email with a link to reset your password.

passwordMustHave8Char.message: Password must have at least 8 characters

serverDidNotResponded.message: Registration: the server did not responded with expected status code (201)

problemWithRegistration.message: There was a problem with your registration. We were notified about it and will do our best to solve it as quickly as possible. Please do try again later.

somethingWentWrongTryAgain.message: Something went wrong, we have been notified about it. Please try again in a moment.

youHaveToBeLoggedToChangeSettings.message: You have to be logged in to change this setting.

showMeNotificationWhenIVisitPartners.message: Show me a notification when I visit one of Altruisto's partners' shop and have an opportunity to raise money for charities with my purchases

defaultHelp.message: By default the help from unlogged users goes to: Against Malaria Foundation, Schistosomiasis Control Initiative, and Give Directly.

inFewWeeksWeWouldBe.message: , in a few short weeks we would be

helpingHundredsOfThousandsOfPeople.message: helping hundreds of thousands of people

experienceWhatIsBestInLife.message: experience what's best in life, instead of suffering, pain, helplessness.

youAreCloseToHelpingFirstPerson.message: You are so close to helping first person!

toSeeTheImpactSingUp.message: To see the exact impact you had with your online shopping you need to sign up.

makeYourFirstPurchaseToSeeImpact.message: Make your first purchase with Altruisto to see how much impact you can have!
